item.name: Версия прошивки микропроцессора
item.description: The firmware revision of the UPS system's microprocessor

item.name: Верхний порог (V) для перехода на работу от батареи
item.description: The maximum line voltage in VAC allowed before the UPS system transfers to battery backup.

item.name: Время, прошедшее с момента как ИБП перешел на работу от батареи
item.description: The elapsed time since the UPS has switched to battery power

item.name: Входное максимальное зарегистрированное напряжение
item.description: The maximum utility line voltage in VAC over the previous 1 minute period

item.name: Входное минимальное зарегистрированное напряжение
item.description: The minimum utility line voltage in VAC over the previous 1 minute period

item.name: Входное напряжение
item.description: The current utility line voltage in VAC

item.name: Выходная потребляемая нагрузка в амперах
item.description: The current in amperes drawn by the load on the UPS

item.name: Выходное напряжение
item.description: The output voltage of the UPS system in VAC

item.name: Индикатор замены батареи
item.description: Indicates whether the UPS batteries need replacing.

item.name: Модель устройства
item.description: The UPS model name (e.g. 'APC Smart-UPS 600')

item.name: Напряжение батареии
item.description: The actual battery bus voltage in Volts

item.name: Нижний порог (В) для перехода на работу от батареи
item.description: The minimum line voltage in VAC allowed before the UPS system transfers to battery backup.

item.name: Причина последнего перехода на работу от батареи
Серийный номер микропроцессора
item.description: An 8-character string identifying the serial number of the UPS internal microprocessor. This number is set at the factory. NOTE: This number does NOT correspond to the serial number on the rear of the UPS

item.name: Статус батареи
item.description: The status of the UPS batteries. A batteryLow(3) value indicates the UPS will be unable to sustain the current load, and its services will be lost if power is not restored. The amount of run time in reserve at the time of low battery can be configured by the upsAdvConfigLowBatteryRunTime. A batteryInFaultCondition(4)value indicates that a battery installed has an internal error condition.

item.name: Текущая нагрузка
item.description: The current UPS load expressed in percent of rated capacity

item.name: Температура батареи
item.description: The current internal UPS temperature expressed in Celsius

item.name: Температура внутри ИБП
item.description: The actual internal temperature of the UPS system in Celsius

item.name: Уровень заряда батареи
item.description: The remaining battery capacity expressed in percent of full capacity

item.name: Частота входной линии
item.description: The current input frequency to the UPS system in Hz

item.name: Частота выходной линии
item.description: The current output frequency of the UPS system in Hz
